name: Fallen (itch) (ScottJams)
description:
In this atmospheric walking simulator, you play a young woman who returns to her childhood home to confront the trauma of her past. Find the key, face your fear.

This two-week project was created as part of RatJam 2021 Controls Mouse + Keyboard
  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to Look
  • Left-click or E to Interact
Controller
  • Left stick to Move
  • Right Stick to Look
  • Bottom Gamepad button to Interact
